attributes.action: Dismiss ministers and advisors involved with the olympic bid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Primeminster I request that all ministers and goverment advisors involved with the promotion of the London olympic bid be dismissed from public office and any financial advisors never be allowed to work or bid for future goverment work - in any other sector for such gross underestimating of final costs would be dismissed for gross misconduct
